rule.name: ApexAssertionsShouldIncludeMessage
rule.message: The second parameter of System.assert/third parameter of System.assertEquals/System.assertNotEquals is a message. Having a second/third parameter provides more information and makes it easier to debug the test failure and improves the readability of test output.
